name: Pulse - Reveal the world through sound
blurb: Pulse is a first person survival game that takes place in an unseen world revealed only by sound.

rewards.reward: YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS. Because you helped make this game possible. You also get our appreciation and a digital hug.

DIGITAL COPY OF THE GAME. The meat and potatoes of rewards, Pulse is being developed simultaneously for Windows, Mac and Linux. Includes all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
The delivery of the game is TBD. We want to bring you the most polished experience we can, and will not ship a sub-par product before it's done.

DIGITAL ART BOOK. A compiled digital version of concept and production art from the game. BACKER-EXCLUSIVE PULSE WALLPAPER in a variety of resolutions to fit your favourite device. Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
This reward will be delivered with the game, whose delivery is TBD.

DIGITAL COPY OF "TALES FROM THE BAKERY" The very best strips of our Dev Diary comic compiled together! DIGITAL COPY OF PULSE SOUNDTRACK for your listening pleasure. Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
This reward will be delivered with the game, whose delivery is TBD.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL OF THE $70 TIER (See below). A special thanks for our early adopters! Includes the game and all previous rewards.

BACKER EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT *OR* 7-INCH MOKO PLUSHIE. Choose between an exclusive Pulse t-shirt worn only by backers of the project, or an adorable 7-inch Moko plushie for cuddling... and throwing. Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Backer exclusive t-shirt OR 7-inch Moko plushie, digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
The estimated delivery of this reward reflects only new items for this tier. See other tiers for their delivery times.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL OF THE $110 TIER (See below). A special thanks for our early adopters! Includes the game and all previous rewards.

BACKER EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT *AND* 7-INCH MOKO PLUSHIE. Sport an exclusive Pulse t-shirt worn only by backers of the project, while cuddling (or throwing?) a 7-inch Moko plushie. Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Backer exclusive t-shirt, 7-inch Moko plushie, digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
The estimated delivery of this reward reflects only new items for this tier. See other tiers for their delivery times.

BE INCLUDED IN A "TALES FROM THE BAKERY" COMIC STRIP. Our artists will pen cartoon-you in to one of our dev story comics. You'll also receive a PRINTED "TALES FROM THE BAKERY" BOOK, so you can flaunt your fame wherever you go! Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Be included in a "Tales from the Bakery" comic strip, a printed copy of the "Tales from the Bakery" book, backer exclusive t-shirt, 7-inch Moko plushie, digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
This reward will be delivered with the game, whose delivery is TBD.

PRINTED ART BOOK. A compilation of concept art from the making of Pulse. Also, choose from ONE OF FOUR DIFFERENT PULSE POSTERS, signed by the development team. Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Printed art book, 1 of 4 signed Pulse posters, be included in a "Tales from the Bakery" comic strip, a printed copy of the "Tales from the Bakery" book, backer exclusive t-shirt, 7-inch Moko plushie, digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
This reward will be delivered with the game, whose delivery is TBD.

ALL FOUR SIGNED PULSE POSTERS. Deck out your pad with each of the Pulse posters, signed by the development team. Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: 4 signed Pulse posters, printed art book, be included in a "Tales from the Bakery" comic strip, a printed copy of the "Tales from the Bakery" book, backer exclusive t-shirt, 7-inch Moko plushie, digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
The estimated delivery of this reward reflects only new items for this tier. See other tiers for their delivery times.

EXCLUSIVE ORIGINAL SCULPTURE AND ART PRINT. Hand-crafted by team member Lan Roed and her significant other, Ben Bonner. Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Exclusive original art from Lan and Ben, 4 signed Pulse posters, printed art book, be included in a "Tales from the Bakery" comic strip, a printed copy of the "Tales from the Bakery" book, backer exclusive t-shirt, 7-inch Moko plushie, digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
This reward will be delivered with the game, whose delivery is TBD.

DINE WITH US AT DARK TABLE: THE BLIND DINING RESTAURANT. Dinner's on us! Come meet the team and dine in the dark. If you're in North America, we will fly you to Vancouver and show you around town, take you to dinner, and take a long walk on the beach. No kissing on the first date though. (Must be able to travel to Vancouver, Canada. Flight cost included if flight origin is in North America). Includes the game and all previous rewards.
=============================
FULL LIST: Dine with us in Vancouver, exclusive original art from Lan and Ben, 4 signed Pulse posters, printed art book, be included in a "Tales from the Bakery" comic strip, a printed copy of the "Tales from the Bakery" book, backer exclusive t-shirt, 7-inch Moko plushie, digital copy of "Tales from the Bakery", digital copy of Pulse soundtrack, digital art book, backer-exclusive Pulse wallpaper, digital copy of the game, your name in the credits, appreciation and digital hugs.
=============================
The delivery of this reward will be decided based on what works best for the backer.
